titles.title: Holy Holy Holy Lord - Stand & give

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
A
Holy Holy Holy Lord
Worthy You are worthy
Holy Lord
To receive all glory and honor
To receive all worship and praise

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Only You alone are worthy
Worthy of all honor
You alone are worthy
Holy Lord

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Only You alone are worthy
Holy Lord

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Stand and give Him honor
Sisters:Lift your voices high
Stand and give Him glory
Sisters:Come and Magnify
Jesus Christ who comes to reign
Over all the world

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Stand in adoration
Sisters:With the angels cry
He alone is worthy
Sisters:Come and magnify
Jesus Christ
Who comes to reign
Over all the world

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines:
Jesus Christ who
Comes to reign
Over all the world
